text_messages.full_credit_text: means that you completed the requirements in this topic by solving at least 2 problems (1 Tracing problem and 1 Coding problem).
text_messages.half_credit_text: means that you completed half of the requirements in this topic by solving at least 1 problem (1 Tracing problem or 1 Coding problem).
text_messages.no_credit_text: means that you have not solved any problem in this topic.
